Name: Spacetime Simulation
EnvironmentDesc: ['Recommend for teams with over <color=#55D0F0>5000 BP</color>', '<color=#55D0F0>Trial characters</color> will be provided. We recommend you to use them in <color=#55D0F0>Normal difficulty</color>.']
BuffDesc: 1. A <color=#55D0F0>countdown</color> will start upon entering the stage. When the <color=#55D0F0>countdown reaches 0</color>, <color=#55D0F0>the stage will fail</color>. 2. After failure, the <color=#55D0F0>countdown will be reset</color> for you to challenge again.

Name: Recompiled Code
EnvironmentDesc: ['In this chapter, tactical <color=#55D0F0>bonus becomes more powerful</color> when there is <color=#55D0F0>more time remaining</color>.', 'Accumulate more time to get higher tactical bonuses.']
BuffDesc: 1. A <color=#55D0F0>countdown</color> will start upon entering the stage. When the <color=#55D0F0>countdown reaches 0</color>, <color=#55D0F0>the stage will fail</color>. 2. After failure, the <color=#55D0F0>countdown will be reset</color> for you to challenge again.

Name: Overclock Acceleration
EnvironmentDesc: ['In this chapter: Tactics will <color=#FF0000>accelerate the time</color> and provide <color=#55D0F0>more powerful buffs</color>.', 'Focus on a single type of buffs to maximize the tactical bonuses.']
BuffDesc: 1. A <color=#55D0F0>countdown</color> will start upon entering the stage. When the <color=#55D0F0>countdown reaches 0</color>, <color=#55D0F0>the stage will fail</color>. 2. After failure, the <color=#55D0F0>countdown will be reset</color> for you to challenge again.

Name: Data Contamination
EnvironmentDesc: ['In this chapter, <color=#55D0F0>different actions</color> will <color=#55D0F0>change the time in different ways</color>.', "Choose the appropriate type of tactics based on the characters' features."]
BuffDesc: 1. A <color=#55D0F0>countdown</color> will start upon entering the stage. When the <color=#55D0F0>countdown reaches 0</color>, <color=#55D0F0>the stage will fail</color>. 2. After failure, the <color=#55D0F0>countdown will be reset</color> for you to challenge again.

Name: Computation Overload
